randMeasures 0.0.0.9000

randMeasures

The goal of randMeasures is to easily compute several measures on human random sequence generation.

Installation

You can install the development version of randMeasures from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("lucas-castillo/randMeasures")
